mapper.insert: insert into messages(message_num, send_id, receive_id, title, content, credate) values(meg_seq.nextval, #{sendId}, #{receiveId}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select m.MESSAGE_NUM, m.TITLE, m.CONTENT ,m.CREDATE, e.name sendName from messages m, employees e where m.send_id = e.employee_id and receive_id=#{receive_id} and credate between sysdate-3 and sysdate+1
SELECT NVL(COUNT(message_num), 0) FROM messages WHERE receive_id=#{receiveId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY message_num DESC) rnum, message_num, send_id, receive_id, credate, title, content FROM messages WHERE receive_id=#{receiveId}) WHERE rnum >= #{startPage} AND rnum <= #{endPage} ORDER BY message_num DESC
select * from messages where receive_id=#{receiveId} order by credate desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY message_num DESC) rnum, message_num, send_id, receive_id, credate, title, content FROM messages WHERE receive_id=#{receiveId} AND send_id=#{sendId}) WHERE rnum >= #{startPage} AND rnum <= #{endPage} ORDER BY credate DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(message_num), 0) FROM messages WHERE receive_id=#{receiveId} AND send_id=#{sendId}
